big data platform for sci-tech knowledge

Intelligent retrieval in vertical domain is significant.

In the era of artificial intelligence with big data, knowledge base-based intelligent retrieval in vertical domain is a significant development. We benefit from intelligent retrieval to efficiently manage large data, display massive fragmented knowledge structurally, and extract valuable information from it for trending analysis and prediction.

Many retrieval platforms emerge

In the field of Sci-tech Literature Retrieval, many retrieval platforms emerge, such as Google Scholar, Scopus, Semantic Scholar, AMiner and so on. However, the above platforms lack the multi-source data fusion and diffusion of innovations in the industry, while, with the development of artificial intelligence, empowering the traditional industry with artificial intelligence become a hot spot in the research field.

what helenus do?

Researching the field of artificial intelligence, we pulled over 3 million records of multi-source data such as papers, news and patents.

We designed a reusable vertical domain retrieval framework named VIIA-RIIR, based on which the intelligent retrieval and visualization platform Helenus.ai was constructed

The Helenus could support the intelligent retrieval and visualization at the million level of multi-source data

what helenus can help you?

Based on the information visualization of Helenus.ai, you can analyze development status, technology ecology, organization layout, industry application and national competition concerning artificial intelligence.
